title: Github Community Standards and additional Issue Templates
creator: KrishnaTO
body:
## Add contributors.md 
Following Github [Community Standards](https://github.com/AgriculturalSemantics/agro/community), adding contributors page, forked from ENVO for the time being. Need to update later.

title: Import classes from ENVO
creator: KrishnaTO
body:
### Please describe the issue in as much detail as possible

Per [envo issue #369](https://github.com/EnvironmentOntology/envo/issues/369), import:
- [conductivity of soil](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_09200016) 
- soil salinity (ENVO:3200079) [part of [envo PR #1228](https://github.com/EnvironmentOntology/envo/pull/1228)

title: Think how to open AgrO for not experimental activities
creator: celineaubert
body: AgrO is currently based on ''agricultural experiment plot''. How could we change that to open it for non experimental data?

title: Create a cvs file of the ontology during release
creator: marieALaporte
body: The file will be used by non-ontology experts. Ideally the file should not contain top level classes that can be confusing for agronomists.

title: tillage present twice?
creator: cmungall
body:
I think a mistake was made when implementing @pbuttigieg's request for #33 - tillage was added as a new class, not a synonym

We now have this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50745/67509868-cd108180-f648-11e9-9546-20871388054f.png)

I think tillage and tillage process should be merged

title: Mounted, trailed and self-propelled implements
creator: richardostler
body: It would be useful to capture how implements are attached to tractors or if self-propelled. For example, a chemical [sprayer](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/AGRO_00000145) could be trailed (pulled by a tractor or animal), mounted onto a tractor, or self propelled (see http://knight-ltd.co.uk/). A combine harvester would always be self-propelled.

title: New "unit": Count per square meter
creator: frostbytten
body: I don't know at what level this could be implemented, but there is a need for a count per square meter (for example, plant population) as a unit. How could this be handled?

title: material classes --> ENVO
creator: pbuttigieg
body: Based on our original design of AGRO, several classes in (e.g. `liming material`, note the issues with multiple inheritance) should be moved into ENVO.

title: Axioms and input prompting
creator: pbuttigieg
body:
This is more a general reminder - perhaps to be transferred to a wiki page or README.
@brianjlowe FYI

Ensure that the axioms on classes can be used by the fieldbook to prompt for required input.
For example, with 

```
'agronomic trial' 'has part' some 'replication plan' and 'treatment plan' and ...
``` 
The axioms will be used to prompt fieldbook users for input on the classes they point to. This is transitive, so `replication plan` will have subclasses such as `split-plot design` which can be offered in a dropdown.

title: Geopolitical regions
creator: pbuttigieg

title: Need complementary units and better PATO quality class for irrigation water quantity
creator: celineaubert
body:
Currently the class `irrigation water quantity` is under the quality class  `amount`. However, this class does not seems to match for a quantity of water.
Also, the units currently linked to `irrigation water quantity recording protocol` are mm et liter. But many other units are used to value the quantity of water http://agriinfo.in/?page=topic&superid=1&topicid=17

title: Add design patterns for AgrO
creator: cmungall
body:
As discussed with @marieALaporte we will specify YAML DPs in the same way we are doing for TO - in particular for measurements and qualities.

At first there may be some overlap with ENVO pre-composed qualities, but we will cross that when we come to it

This encompasses #14
